abstract: The company, headquartered in Connecticut, made the move after the Sandy Hook elementary school massacre.
snippet: The company, headquartered in Connecticut, made the move after the Sandy Hook elementary school massacre.
lead_paragraph: GE Capital, General Electric’s lending arm, recently stopped offering consumer financing programs to retailers whose main business is selling guns, in response to the “industry changes, new legislation and tragic events.”

headline.main: GE Capital Cuts Gun Shop Purchase Loans
headline.print_headline: GE Capital Cuts Gun Shop Purchase Loans
